title: Fix cumulative premium
content: This premium is a fixed amount of money that is added to the employee's total pay if the conditions are met. It can be programmed to be paid after a certain number of hours. It will apply once according to the defined period.Â Example:A flat-rate premium of 3$ is granted to employees when they work more than 8 hours a day. An employee works 10 hours, as this premium is fixed he will receive 3$.
